ROMance

ROMance is an experimental emulator that runs web based on Android/iOS/PC devices/browsers and emulates the functionality of a Nintendo Entertainment System™, licensed under GPL-3.0 License

ROMance

This project is an Android port of the Atralbus/deprem project. It allows people to easily show other people's help calls as points on Google Maps through the app.
